additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Aqua, Aluminum Chlorohydrate, PPG-15 Stearyl Ether, Steareth-2, Steareth-21, Parfum, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract, Bisabolol, Persea Gratissima Oil, Glycine Soja Oil, Trisodium EDTA, BHT, Linalool, Geraniol, Citronellol

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Do not apply to irritated or damaged skin.
